# init(from:)

**Initializer**

Creates an instance from the given decoder.

## Declaration

```swift
init(from decoder: any Decoder) throws
```

## Parameters

- **decoder**: The decoder to read from.

## Decoding and encoding

- **encode(to:)**: Performs encoding of the value using the given encoder.

items.description: Performs encoding of the value using the given encoder.
